name: GoodWell
description:
GoodWell is a little arcade game created in a day for VinJam: Collectables, about a mysterious well that turns everything into gold. Play as Crunchy and get as many coins as you can, by throwing all kinds of garbage (and even other people) into the well. And don't forget about eldritch creatures...

Use to move around and key to grab objects and throw them (you can also hold to choose direction and throw precisely. Simple as that!
